channel.title: Barrows
channel.description:
Eh... While testing barrows, I pretty much instantly noticed this.
The minimap is showing where I was before I dug into the tomb of one of the barrows brothers. It has random black lines for some reason I don't know.
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/barrowsmap.png[/img]
Also, the tomb itself is fine. The map and the part that's supposed to be black [b]outside[/b] of the tomb, is odd too. Here's what I mean.
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/barrowsmap2.png[/img]
It's like this for each brothers' tomb.

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:427944”]2nd problem is because of models, you need to repack the non messed up model (834 iirc) into the cache

1st problem is a problem with how your client handles the packet to black out the minimap[/quote]

Any idea how to fix the 1st problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

2nd problem is because of models, you need to repack the non messed up model (834 iirc) into the cache

1st problem is a problem with how your client handles the packet to black out the minimap

Read full topic
